description: Wow, the first trail in Regina.  This is an urban ride and we're usually not big on these but ya' gotta start somewhere.  For tourists to Regina, this is a good start.After an extensive beautyfication eh, Wascana Lake in the heart of Regina is open for business.  If you want to canoe, kayak, chase Canada Geese, or go for a stroll or an urban ride you can do it all here.  Loops from 2 to 25 km are possible and all within walking distance from downtown hotels.
directions: From Albert Street, Broad Street or the Hiway #1 Bypass on the east side, there is access everywhere.  An easy way is to look for the Provincial Legislature building just South of Downtown and park somewhere close to that.

stats.Activities: river-kayak river-canoe sea-kayak hike ski-xc mtn-bike

title: Wascana Lake - Regina Trails
